subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] A Grand Junction voice.
author: Vicki Talbott
full_text:
--0-1419038203-1154015848=:22192
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hi Frank and all,
  I know what you mean, Frank.  It's very frustrating sometimes to play something most of us in the field would consider quite clear only to be met with blank stares.  When I met up with a couple of old friends on my vacation to PA (I hadn't seen them in 10 years) I introduced them to EVP.  They walked away stunned, but there were times when I heard something clearly as did others in these kinds of groups, and they wouldn't hear it.  I think the point is that if we can get the average Joe to hear at least some of them, we are on the right track.  And if the EVP is contextual, that's even better.  For example, I asked them to say 'hi' to my friends by name, and they did, albeit Class B.  These people were in shock.  Vicki

Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:
               I�m sorry, I didn�t mean it to sound that way. It�s not this group that can�t hear, it�s humanity in general, and the problem of getting this stuff so the average person can hear it. if the average guy on the street can�t hear this stuff, than I feel like I�m just spinning my wheels. 
  
      
---------------------------------
  
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Amy Swanson
Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2006 8:15 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] A Grand Junction voice.

  
          OKAY FRANK, HERES THE DIFFERENCE BETWWEN YOU AND ME, YOU CAN HEAR THEM! I CANT! THE POINT IS THAT YOU KNOW WHATS THERE, WHAT THEY WANT TO TELL YOU. ISNT THAT ALL THAT REALLY MATTERS! 

    I COULD HEAR THE BEAUTIFUL PART. CONSIDERING THAT I CANT CLEAN THESE FILES I CANT MAKE OUT THE VOICE 75% OF THE TIME, YOU HAVE A GOOD THING GOING! I THINK SOMEWHERE DOWN THE LINE YOUR GOING TO FIND SOMETHING AMAZING WITHIN YOUR SELF! A GIFT MAYBE? A CALLING, BUT SOMETHING GREAT IS GOING TO HAPPEN TO YOU. DONT DOUBT YOURSELF, THATS JUST NEGATIVE ENERGYS AROUND YOU TRYING TO DISCOURAGE YOU FROM YOUR WORK.

    

    BLESSINGS ALWAYS

    AMY

Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:

            Thanks! I wish there was a way to get across what I hear. This is becoming discouraging, because if no one else can hear this stuff, what�s the point? 

     Frank

      
---------------------------------
  
    From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Amy Swanson
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2006 4:49 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A Grand Junction voice.


          thats kewl, i can hear this beautiful " plain as day
